attributes.review: Okay so I downloaded this app because I love are racist sexist homophobic Cheeto president :) . Anyway, I downloaded the app and it kept crashing every time. So I gave it a one star review and next thing I know the Oompa Loompas show up and start taking all my avocados! They also took my hot Cheetos and my kiwis! And get this! Even my DOGS were taken! All 3 of them!! I will not be getting this app ever again. Give me my dogs back >:(
attributes.title: Stole my food and my dogs

attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app and support Donald!! But then it told me that he doesn’t believe in climate change and is incredibly sexist! Being someone who wants to help make a difference with climate change it was very appalling for me to read that the president of the free world does not even believe in it. I just truly do not understand how stupid one person could be.
attributes.title: This app ruined everyone’s lives

attributes.review:
Somebody once told me the world is gonna roll me
I ain't the sharpest tool in the shed
She was looking kind of dumb with her finger and her thumb
In the shape of an "L" on her forehead
Well, the years start coming and they don't stop coming
Fed to the rules and I hit the ground running
Didn't make sense not to live for fun
Your brain gets smart but your head gets dumb
So much to do, so much to see
So what's wrong with taking the backstreets?
You'll never know if you don't go
You'll never shine if you don't glow
Hey now, you're an all star
Get your game on, go play
Hey now, you're a rock star
Get the show on, get paid
And all that glitters is gold
Only shooting stars break the mold
I hope Bunker Boy reads this.
attributes.title: PLEASE READ THIS IS IMPORTANT!

attributes.review: I tried to run the app, but it didn’t work. I ended up having to delete the app off my phone, but it wouldn’t so I clicked the app again and the loading screen said: please wait.. collecting data.. software is a iPhone 8.. and it went on about my personal data! I can’t believe this! The government is spying on me! 😒😒😒😒 think again before you try to get away with steeling my dog.
attributes.title: THIS IS TERRIBLE 😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: i wanted to support my non racist non homophobic non misogynistic president 🧿👅👁 first off the app to 69 weeks to download and when i finally opened it it directed me to the h u b and it hacked my phone all the photos were bill nye the science guy naked👼🔪 futher in i relized it replaced all my contacts with the suicide hotline numbers 🩸 🔪 of all countrys it deleted all my apps and made them all hentai apps after t ha t it changed my wall paper to naked trump🥺how could t he y do th at to our wonderful president 😔🦹‍♀️it wouldn’t let me delte the app and now when i open it i get death threats of him saying hes going to kill bill nye as he is being held hostage.👼👀😢🦹‍♀️🥺😔🩸👅 overall i would rate it 0/10
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: My experience with this app was horrible. It took over 69 days to download and after that there was a 420 minute waiting period where you need to pledge loyalty to our totally accepting and just president. After learning how to got that perfect orange sun tan you go to the app and see that most of the information provided is dated back to the 1920s where this belief system was generalized. So please do not download this app.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app took FORVER to load. Like it took 8 hours of my previous time!! If that’s not bad enough when I went to open it. It tried to track my location! 😡 typical spyware to help the government see what I’m doing! After that it started glitching and tried to take over my precious phone!! I thought I could trust my non-racist & LGBTQ+- friendly president with his app! If I could give 0 stars I would 🤬.
attributes.title: Horrible 🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to get more informed because this will be my first year voting. However, when it finished downloading it started glitching out when I opened it, showing a picture of a fuzzy orange and calling it a racist and a rapist. Got to admit, it looks a suspicious amount like our current president today. This app is terrible just like the state our country is today under trump.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Do not download this app it took several hours to download and immediately asks for your phone number. the app is very confusing to use as i only got to the phone number page. along with asking for your number it shows a very disturbing photo is a cheeto. why show a picture of that cheeto if your asking for my number. COMMON SENSE people. thank you for your time
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review:
I just wanted to make sure I got this app ever since I reserved my tickets for the 7/11 rally, which you can do free of charge. Reserving is a great way to make sure at least two seats are left empty for you at the rally. You should definitely reserve ahead of time so they can prepare for bigger crowds even if the attendance is low. 
Anywho I got the app but it asks for your phone number 😖 so i deleted it
attributes.title: reserve your rally tickets!!
